name: Geordi Taylor
headline: The strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution.
bio: A technology leader with over a decade of experience serving as the strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution in high-stakes, regulated environments. From navigating technical debt and complex stakeholder landscapes in energy and finance, to driving large-scale digital transformation â€” I bring transferable strategic leadership to every challenge.
narrativeIntro: My career has been shaped by a relentless drive to orchestrate complex, regulated systems â€” from co-founding a biofuels startup to publishing energy policy research at Bloomberg, modernizing fintech platforms at Morgan Stanley, and now leading digital transformation at one of the world's largest energy companies.

development.context: Immersive study in Germany focused on global economics and international business.
Professional education in data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy) and backend database management.

languages.context: Advanced professional working proficiency; Minor in French from Pace University.
Native fluency; leveraging deep cultural and linguistic roots to navigate diverse international environments.
Basic conversational proficiency developed during immersion at the University of Mannheim.
